item.title: Bookmarks
item.description: Life Calgary stories Livewire: Calgary’s Next Economy the sprawl: Should Calgary ditch the cowboy motif — or embrace it? the sprawl: The secret cities we all carry with us Cities are people places Strong Towns: You Have All the Parking You Need—And It’s Hiding in Plain Sight Strong Towns: Are Parking Lots Ruining Your City? Not Just Bikes: The Strong Towns playlist Not Just Bikes: The Truth about American Cities [ST01] Not Just Bikes: How Suburban Development Makes American Cities Poorer [ST02] Not Just Bikes: Why American Cities Are Broke - The Growth Ponzi Scheme [ST03] Not Just Bikes: How Bankrupt American Cities Stay Alive - Debt [ST04] Not Just Bikes: Stroads are Ugly, Expensive, and Dangerous (and they’re everywhere) [ST05] Not Just Bikes: The Wrong Way to Set Speed Limits [ST06] Not Just Bikes: Suburbia is Subsidized: Here’s the Math [ST07] Not Just Bikes: Would You Fall for It?
